name: Burn The Tree
description:
Controls

Left-Click: Attack

A/D - Left/Right

Space - Jump

You can wall jump.

Story

Santa and his workshop workers have been possessed by something evil and it is up to you to go back in time and stop Santa before they can wreak havoc on the world.

Game by Cephypod

Cephy (Comms OPEN) (@Cephypod) / Twitter

Music by Johnny Gears

Johnny K (@JohnnyKGames) / Twitter

  • Snow tileset by CodeRaurus (itch.io)
  • RPG christmas battlers pack by Franuka (itch.io)
